title: Ticket #2666: libcondorapi can't be properly loaded
description:
While bringing condor_pigeon up to date, I noticed that libcondorapi seems to cause some issues. Pigeon's user log reader immediately aborts when linked from Condor 7.7 with the following back trace 

#0  0x0000003dab830265 in raise () from /lib64/libc.so.6
#1  0x0000003dab831d10 in abort () from /lib64/libc.so.6
#2  0x000000000045d267 in not_impl ()
    at /scratch/cweiss/condor/workspace/CONDOR_SRC/src/condor_utils/libcondorapi_stubs.cpp:103
#3  0x000000000045d323 in Regex::Regex (this=0x2aaaab0e07b0)
    at /scratch/cweiss/condor/workspace/CONDOR_SRC/src/condor_utils/libcondorapi_stubs.cpp:355
#4  0x00002aaaaac67721 in __static_initialization_and_destruction_0 (__initialize_p=1, __priority=65535)
    at /scratch/cweiss/condor/workspace/CONDOR_SRC/src/condor_utils/condor_crontab.cpp:43
#5  0x00002aaaaac6774f in global constructors keyed to _ZN7CronTab10attributesE() ()
    at /scratch/cweiss/condor/workspace/CONDOR_SRC/src/condor_utils/condor_crontab.cpp:932
#6  0x00002aaaaadf7316 in __do_global_ctors_aux ()
   from /scratch/cweiss/condor/workspace/test/CONDOR_SRC/release_dir/lib/libcondor_utils.so
#7  0x00002aaaaabe583b in _init ()
   from /scratch/cweiss/condor/workspace/test/CONDOR_SRC/release_dir/lib/libcondor_utils.so
#8  0x00002aaaac771cc0 in ?? ()
#9  0x0000003dab40d3fb in call_init () from /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2
#10 0x0000003dab40d505 in _dl_init_internal () from /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2
#11 0x0000003dab400aaa in _dl_start_user () from /lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2
#12 0x0000000000000001 in ?? ()
#13 0x00007fffffffe8c1 in ?? ()
#14 0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
creator: cweiss
